meta.title: Get Form Fields - Form Fields - Form Fields - REST - Storefront APIs - API Docs
meta.description:
Gets form fields.



Note

The Send a Test Request feature is not currently supported for this endpoint.

blocks.data:
Gets form fields.
> ### Note > The Send a Test Request feature is not currently supported for this endpoint.
Returns an object with form fields groups.

customerAccount.description: List of form fields for the group

custom.description: Wether is a custom field or system built-in field.

required.description: Wether this field is required or not

type.description: Type of the value hold by the field

min.description: The minimun valid value for the field (integer and date type only)

max.description: The minimun valid value for the field (integer and date type only)

maxLength.description: The maximum length for the value (string type only)

secret.description: Whether the field represents a password field

options.description: Extra data for radio, dropdown and checkbox field types.

helperLabel.description: Placeholder text for dropdown field type.

items.description: List of possible values for this field.

shippingAddress.description: List of form fields for the group
